q1.question: How does FripeScan work?
q1.answer: Simply take a photo of your garment with the app. Our artificial intelligence analyzes the brand, style, condition and market prices to give you an instant estimate.

q2.question: Is the app free?
q2.answer: Yes! You get 3 free scans per week. For unlimited scans and advanced features, upgrade to Premium for only â‚¬4.99/month.

q3.question: What types of clothes can I scan?
q3.answer: All types of clothing: t-shirts, jeans, dresses, jackets, shoes, accessories... Our AI recognizes thousands of different brands and styles.

q4.question: How do I get bonus scans?
q4.answer: Refer your friends! Every time a friend signs up with your code, you both receive 5 free bonus scans. Bonus scans never expire.

q5.question: Are the estimates reliable?
q5.answer: Our AI is trained on thousands of garments and analyzes market prices in real time. Estimates are indicative and help you set a fair price for your items.
